name: Light My Fire FireSteel BIO Army
description:
Originally developed for the Swedish military, it functions in the dark, in the wet, and when the wind is howling up the fjords.FireSteel is a magnesium alloy and striker is stainless steel, both with sugarcane- and wood fibre-based HDPE handle.Offers at least 12,000 strikes.Built-in emergency whistle.Dimensions are 94 x 26 x 17mm.

        Sustainability





.st0{stroke:#333;stroke-width:.79;stroke-miterlimit:10}
